chapter.title: Backup and Restore
chapter.para: The following sections cover backup and restore operations. There are several things you must do before installing your cloud so that you achieve the backup and recovery results you need. &productname; supports backup and restore of control plane services. It comes with playbooks and procedures to recover the control plane from various disaster scenarios.
As of &cloud; 9, Freezer (a distributed backup restore and disaster recovery service) is no longer supported; backup and restore are manual operations.
You should consider in case you lose cloud servers that back up and restore services.

listitem.para: Backup of your file system using a point-in-time snapshot.
Restoring your data from a previous backup.
Low storage requirement: backups are stored as compressed files.
Data is archived in GNU Tar format for file-based incremental backup and restore.
When a key is provided, Open SSL is used to encrypt data (AES-256-CFB).
